name: product_promotion_2
description: Enhanced product promotion template with a modern Kanban UI aesthetic

fieldPrompt.image_url: Generate a prompt for a high-quality product or service image (min 2000x1500px). The image should be well-lit, professional, and showcase your product/service in an appealing way. For best results, use a clean background that contrasts with your product.
fieldPrompt.logo_url: generate a prompt for the company logo (min 500x500px, PNG with transparent background). Ensure the logo is clear and legible at different sizes. Vector formats are preferred for best quality.
fieldPrompt.theme_color: Enter a hex color code (e.g., #4A90E2) that represents your brand. This color will be used for the gradient background and text accents. Choose a color that provides good contrast with white text.
fieldPrompt.quote1: Enter a short, impactful headline (3-5 words) that captures attention. Example: 'Organize with Ease', 'Work Smarter, Not Harder'.
fieldPrompt.quote2: Add a supporting subheading (50-70 words) that expands on your headline. Example: 'Streamline your workflow today', 'Transform your productivity overnight'.
fieldPrompt.cta_text: Enter a clear call-to-action (e.g., 'Get Started', 'Learn More', 'Try for Free').
